name: Matapalo
description: Private, beautifully designed villa with exceptional 180 degree views of the Pacific Ocean, surrounded by tropical rain forest with an abundance of wildlife. This house is ideal for nature lovers looking for a very private and secluded place that's only a 5 minute drive to the beach. Located mins from the hway, in a private and secure location, only 12 mins from Dominical, 30 mins from both Manuel Antonio National Park & Uvita's "whale tail". The perfect location to explore the Pacific region. The house provides total privacy, it's not overlooked by any neighbour. All 3 bedrooms and the main living area feature grand glass doors with beautiful ocean views and direct access to the pool. Large windows in the bathrooms bring nature in. The modern kitchen is fully equipped, and there's also an outdoor kitchen with gas BBQ on the wooden terrace overlooking the ocean. There is a utility room with a washer and dryer for your convenience. There's parking for 2 cars above the house (there are stairs leading down through the garden), and there's parking for 1 car next to the house. Our neighbourhood is gated for your added peace of mind. We will provide gate access information upon booking.
